ActTrust and Loan Companies Act
SubjectElectronic Documents (Trust and Loan Companies) Regulations
PrecisELECTRONIC DOCUMENTS (TRUST AND LOAN COMPANIES) REGULATIONS, in order to allow institutions to meet the requirements set out in the federal financial institutions statutes that notices, documents and other information be provided by establishing definitions and general requirements for electronic communications.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0240 Publication Date: 2010-11-10
